Certainly! Here are some German TV shows and movies you might enjoy watching:

1. Dark - A popular sci-fi thriller TV show on Netflix, with an intricate plot and twists that will keep you guessing.

2. Babylon Berlin - A crime drama series set in 1920s Berlin, with lots of action, suspense, and political intrigue.

3. Goodbye Lenin! - A comedy-drama movie set in 1990s East Germany, telling the story of a son who tries to shield his mother from political changes after the fall of the Berlin Wall.

4. Toni Erdmann - A comedy-drama film about a father who creates an alter ego to reconnect with his daughter, offering a satirical look at modern-day Germany.

5. Deutschland 83 - A spy thriller set in 1983, during the Cold War era, with a young East German border guard who is recruited to spy on the West.

6. Der Tatortreiniger - A comedy TV show about a crime scene cleaner who has conversations with the ghosts of the deceased.

These shows and movies offer a variety of genres that cater to different tastes, but all of them provide excellent examples of spoken German and can help you improve your language skills. Enjoy watching and learning German!
